attributes.action: Bring back Nit Nurse's in School's
attributes.additional_details:
e-petition to bring back the nit nurse in ALL Primary School's.
The amount of time's I have heard people say "They should bring back the nit nurse" I thought it would be an idead to create a petition for this, especially after my own experience of clearing my Daughter of them, only for her to go back to School and be re-infected with them. I understand that all Children get lice and it is easy treated but unfortunatley there are Parent's who don't have the time to do so.
I would like the government to bring back the good, old fashioned 'Nit Nurse'.
